rules_text: When Jacktar-for-Hire enters the battlefield, search your library for a Vehicle card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
notes:
WU:
 - Five or more artifacts
 - Metalcraft
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
RW:
 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
